translation.en: [narrator] Arizona.
Home to America's great Wild West.
Famous for showdowns between lawmen and bandits,
where legends are made and only the courageous survive.
translation.ko: 전설이 만들어지고 용감한 자들만 살아남는 곳

translation.en: Amid this arid landscape,
ferocious creatures brave this peculiar frontier.
translation.ko: 거친 삶을 살아가는 사나운 생명체들이 있다

translation.en: Whether the good,
the bad,
or the mighty,
you must be quick on the draw -if you hope to survive. -[rattles]
translation.ko: 살아남고 싶으면 상황 판단이 빨라야 한다

translation.en: It's been a long night foraging for food for this desert-dwelling kangaroo rat.
translation.ko: 사막에 사는 이 캥거루쥐는 밤새 먹이를 찾아다녔다

translation.en: Busy collecting a bounty of hundreds of seeds to store
translation.ko: 자기 굴에 저장해둘 수백 개의 씨앗을

translation.en: back at her burrow.
Instead of using her paws to carry the load,
she shovels them into her fur-lined cheek pouches.
translation.ko: 털이 난 볼주머니 안에 재빨리 집어넣는다

translation.en: Time to set off home.
Like a tiny kangaroo,
she uses her powerful back legs to speed through the desert,
translation.ko: 강력한 뒷다리를 이용해 빠르게 사막을 달리고

translation.en: while her long tail helps maintain balance.
Fur on the soles of her feet prevent her from sinking into the loose earth.
translation.ko: 발바닥에 난 털은 헐거운 땅에 빠지지 않게 해준다

translation.en: As she arrives back home,
a young kangaroo rat instantly emerges from the burrow to greet her.
translation.ko: 새끼 캥거루쥐가 굴 밖으로 달려나와 반겨준다

translation.en: He's been eagerly awaiting his mother's return.
Any day now, this adolescent will leave his mother's care
translation.ko: 머지않아 이 어린 캥거루쥐는 엄마의 품을 떠나

translation.en: to begin his journey of independence.
Although he longs to explore the world,
translation.ko: 세계를 탐험하고 싶은 마음은 굴뚝 같지만

translation.en: he lacks the courage to take the decisive step.
translation.ko: 어린 캥거루쥐는 결단을 내릴 용기가 부족하다

translation.en: For now, this is as far as he's willing to venture
from the security of their burrow.
While the desert is cooler at nighttime,
the dark conceals some of the toughest characters in town.
translation.ko: 어둠은 이 지역에서 가장 터프한 동물들을 감추고 있다

translation.en: Kangaroo rats are surrounded by enemies.
A deadly diamondback rattlesnake carries enough venom
to kill more than 60,000 mice.
translation.ko: 죽일 수 있는 강력한 독을 지니고 있다

translation.en: And kangaroo rats are one of their favorite foods.
The naive young kangaroo rat still has much to learn,
translation.ko: 순진한 새끼 캥거루쥐는 아직 배울 게 많고

translation.en: and he hasn't noticed the impending danger.
Rattlesnakes strike their prey faster than the blink of an eye.
translation.ko: 방울뱀은 눈 깜짝할 새보다 빨리 먹이를 공격한다

translation.en: The kangaroo rat's mother's worst fear is unfolding before her very eyes.
translation.ko: 어미 캥거루쥐가 가장 두려워하던 상황이 눈앞에서 벌어진다

translation.en: She sprints to intercept the snake's powerful jaws.
translation.ko: 어미 쥐는 뱀의 강력한 턱을 가로막으려고 뛰어오른다

translation.en: In a split second,
the life of the young kangaroo rat has changed forever.
Now, the lethal rattlesnake switches its attention.
The juvenile is left with no choice but to run.
translation.ko: 어린 쥐는 도망치는 것 외에 선택의 여지가 없다

translation.en: Forced to abandon all he knows, he's pushed out into uncharted territory.
translation.ko: 자신이 아는 걸 다 버리고 미지의 영역으로 도망쳐 들어간다

translation.en: The snake takes over the kangaroo rats' burrow.
The balance of law and order has tipped out of the young rat's favor.
translation.ko: 어린 쥐에게 불리하게 법과 질서의 균형이 깨졌다

translation.en: Driven by grief and fear,
he's been racing as fast and as far away as he can.
translation.ko: 어린 쥐는 최대한 빠르고 멀리 도망친다

translation.en: He's lost the one thing most dear to him.
translation.ko: 새끼 쥐는 가장 소중한 걸 잃었다

translation.en: Having never been away from his home before,
he's unsure of what to do or where to go.
translation.ko: 뭘 해야 할지 어디로 가야 할지 모른다

translation.en: The chances of survival for this naive kangaroo rat look slim.
translation.ko: 이 순진한 캥거루쥐가 생존할 가능성이 희박해 보인다

translation.en: Summer temperatures in Arizona can reach 115 degrees Fahrenheit.
The air is dry, making it hard to breathe.
The burning daylight makes the ground scorched and unbearable underfoot.
translation.ko: 타는 듯한 햇볕으로 땅은 그을리고 발을 딛기가 힘들다

translation.en: The body of the kangaroo rat is designed to reduce water loss.
translation.ko: 캥거루쥐의 몸은 수분 손실을 줄이도록 고안되었다

translation.en: He can perspire only through his feet.
However, he isn't adapted to stay in the sun for long.
translation.ko: 하지만 햇볕에 오래 노출되면 안 된다

translation.en: He'll perish if he stays out for more than an hour.
translation.ko: 한 시간 이상 밖에 있으면 죽을 것이다

translation.en: Seeking shade isn't enough.
He must go underground.
The air inside the tunnel is pungent... but this subterranean shelter
translation.ko: 터널 내부 공기는 쾌쾌하지만 이 지하 은신처는

translation.en: would provide some much-needed relief from the relentless sunlight.
translation.ko: 강렬한 태양을 피할 수 있는 소중한 쉼터가 될 것이다

translation.en: The dark entices him in.
A foot or two below the hot surface exists a honeycomb network of tunnels.
translation.ko: 뜨거운 지표면에서 30~60cm 아래에 복잡한 터널망이 있다

translation.en: It's here many of the desert animals seek respite from the sun.
translation.ko: 많은 사막 동물이 태양을 피해 쉬어가는 곳이다

translation.en: But some life has adapted to thrive above ground.
translation.ko: 하지만 어떤 생명체는 지상에서 잘 자란다

translation.en: The seasonal monsoons of the Sonoran Desert
produce lush pockets of vegetation.
A forest of saguaro cacti.
These giants stand up to 60 feet tall and weigh as much as two tons.
translation.ko: 이 거대한 식물은 18m까지 자라며 무게는 2톤이나 나간다

translation.en: Taking advantage of the rich landscape
are lifeforms who appear as if they are from another time.
translation.ko: 다른 시대에 살았을 법한 생명체들이 살아간다

translation.en: Almost prehistoric.
With a keen sense of smell,
this Gila monster has discovered treasure:
a nest of tortoise eggs carefully hidden in the sand,
translation.ko: 태양 광선을 피해 모래 속에 숨겨져 있던

translation.en: away from the sun's rays.
However, they aren't buried deep enough to protect them from the Gila monster.
translation.ko: 하지만 독도마뱀이 찾지 못할 만큼 깊게 묻혀 있지 않았다

translation.en: Biting through the shell,
it consumes the contents with its forked tongue.
Having gorged as much as it can,
the Gila monster won't need to feed again for months.
translation.ko: 독도마뱀은 몇 달간 먹지 않아도 된다

translation.en: The dragon returns to its lair.
Tasting the air, it's clear it has an unexpected visitor.
translation.ko: 냄새를 맡으니 예상치 못한 방문객이 있는 게 분명하다

translation.en: Kangaroo rats are extremely sensitive to vibrations.
And the sound of something approaching echoes down the chamber.
translation.ko: 뭔가가 다가오는 소리가 터널 안에 울려 퍼진다

translation.en: Slowed down by the weight of its full belly,
the Gila has little chance of catching him.
But the Wild West takes no prisoners.
Tarantulas never venture too far from their burrows,
translation.ko: 타란툴라는 자기 굴에서 절대 멀리 가지 않는데

translation.en: and this Arizona blond tarantula is blocking his exit.
translation.ko: 이 애리조나 블론드 타란툴라가 출구를 막고 있다

translation.en: He's left with no option but to try and slip past the Gila monster.
This hero is once again forced out into the open...
translation.ko: 이 영웅은 다시 한번 밖으로 내몰렸고

translation.en: and even further away from the safety of his own home.
translation.ko: 자신의 안전한 보금자리에서 더 멀리 떨어졌다

translation.en: Isolated and alone, he's uncertain of where to go next.
translation.ko: 외딴 곳에 홀로 남겨져 어디로 가야 할지 막막하다

translation.en: But there's no time to reflect.
A roaring wall of dust thunders towards him.
translation.ko: 거대한 흙 폭풍이 굉음을 내며 다가온다

translation.en: Engulfed in a vicious storm of desert sand and grit,
translation.ko: 사막의 모래와 작은 돌들이 사정없이 몰아쳐

translation.en: he's choked by the plumes of dust.
The surface of the ground is parched and loose.
The wheels of the bike easily churn up the dry soil.
translation.ko: 오토바이 바퀴가 쉽게 마른 흙을 휘젓는다

translation.en: Relative to his size, the kangaroo rat can outmaneuver the bike.
translation.ko: 몸집은 작아도 캥거루쥐는 오토바이를 따돌릴 수 있다

translation.en: Blinded by a wall of dirt,
he finds his way inside something dark and protective.
It's not perfect,
but it provides enough shelter to escape the chaos.
translation.ko: 혼돈을 피할 수있는 은신처가 될 수 있다

translation.en: For the first time since leaving home, he can finally rest.
translation.ko: 집을 떠난 후 처음으로 마침내 쉴 수 있다

translation.en: He's jolted awake.
A false alarm?
The youngster finds himself in the middle of target practice.
This cowboy is an expert marksman.
He takes aim.
Fixated on his target,
he's oblivious of the kangaroo rat inside one of the old cans.
translation.ko: 오래된 깡통 속에 캥거루쥐가 있다는 걸 모른다

translation.en: But a faulty trigger has provided an opportunity to escape.
translation.ko: 하지만 방아쇠에 문제가 있어 탈출할 기회가 생긴다

translation.en: Sent into a spin,
the tin can and the kangaroo rat pick up momentum,
rolling faster and faster to uncharted territory.
An eerie silence blankets the landscape.
Laid out before him is a creepy spectacle.
Bones of the long-deceased stretch out as far as he can see...
translation.ko: 오래된 시체의 뼈가 끝없이 펼쳐져 있다

translation.en: where many have met their end under the desert sun.
translation.ko: 사막의 태양 아래서 생을 마감한 동물들이다

translation.en: But some of these victims didn't get here by accident.
translation.ko: 하지만 몇몇 피해자는 우연히 온 게 아니다

translation.en: A terrifying raptor, the Harris's hawk is an expert hunter.
Locking on to its target, it descends from the sky.
Like a velociraptor, it stalks its prey on foot.
As the kangaroo rat flees for his life,
the pounding steps of the hawk shakes the earth beneath his feet.
An attack could come from any angle.
translation.ko: 매는 어떤 각도에서든 공격할 수 있다

translation.en: The kangaroo rat is quickly running out of places to hide.
It's now or never.
Defeated this time, the hawk gives up the chase and retreats.
translation.ko: 패배한 매가 쫓는 걸 포기하고 후퇴한다

translation.en: The air is cooler now.
The kangaroo rat leaves his hiding place in search of food.
Individually, these morsels don't carry many calories,
but consumed in bulk, they'll sustain him over several days.
translation.ko: 많은 양을 먹으면 며칠을 굶어도 버틸 수 있다

translation.en: Having collected up any bits he wants to save for later,
he must now find somewhere safe to store them.
translation.ko: 이제 안전한 곳을 찾아 보관해야 한다

translation.en: The inside of this shoe looks perfect.
But it's already taken.
This boot isn't big enough for the both of them.
Confronting the intruder is a scorpion.
Armed with a chemical weapon, its razor-sharp tail is loaded with venom.
translation.ko: 화학 무기로 무장한 전갈은 날카로운 꼬리에 독이 들어 있다

translation.en: Too frightened to move, there's no escape for the young kangaroo rat.
translation.ko: 너무 무서워 얼어버린 캥거루쥐는 탈출할 길이 없다

translation.en: But suddenly, the scorpion retreats.
Silhouetted in the moonlight stands a mysterious character.
translation.ko: 달빛 아래에 정체불명의 존재가 모습을 드러낸다

translation.en: Around these parts, he goes by the name the scorpion mouse.
The kangaroo rat takes cover.
The scorpion mouse is a fearless predator of the desert,
and it's on the hunt for its favorite prey.
These two ancient enemies lock together in a deadly battle.
translation.ko: 두 오래된 적수는 필살의 결투를 벌인다

translation.en: Although the scorpion is venomous, the mouse has evolved
translation.ko: 전갈은 독이 있지만 쥐는 전갈의 독에 내성이 생기도록 진화했다

translation.en: a biological resistance to its toxic sting.
translation.ko: 쥐는 전갈의 독에 내성이 생기도록 진화했다

translation.en: Armed with this superpower, the scorpion mouse isn't afraid of much.
translation.ko: 능력으로 무장한 전갈쥐는 두려울 게 없다

translation.en: Having witnessed this true hero of the Wild West,
the kangaroo rat is filled with an overwhelming urge
translation.ko: 캥거루쥐는 마땅히 자기의 것을 되찾고 싶다는

translation.en: to take back what is rightfully his...
and confront the thing he fears the most:
the deadly rattlesnake.
It's his home, and he intends to keep it that way.
translation.ko: 그건 캥거루쥐의 집이며 앞으로 지킬 것이다

translation.en: Determined not to let his story from the past dictate his future,
he must face his fears head-on.
Staring darkness in the face,
he bravely passes through the hawk's lair with a new purpose.
translation.ko: 마음을 굳게 다잡고 매의 은신처를 용감하게 통과한다

translation.en: He knows what he must do.
Using himself as bait, he has the hawk exactly where he wants it.
translation.ko: 자신을 미끼로 삼아 원하는 곳으로 매를 유인한다

translation.en: There is no time to waste.
Finally, he returns home.
Risking his life, he uses every ounce of courage to venture back.
translation.ko: 목숨을 걸고 모든 용기를 끌어내 굴로 들어간다

translation.en: Luring the snake out of the burrow...
he then takes cover to watch as his plan unfolds.
translation.ko: 쥐는 숨어서 자신의 계획이 실행되는 걸 지켜본다

translation.en: It's a setup.
Although the rattlesnake has a deadly bite,
the hawk remains composed.
Standing eye to eye at point-blank range,
the two outlaws size each other up.
It's the ultimate showdown.
Driven away by the formidable Harris's hawk,
the cowardly snake retreats from the fight.
Banished from this town, it'll never return.
translation.ko: 마을에서 추방당했으니 다시는 돌아오지 않을 것이다

translation.en: With the snake gone,
triumphantly this tiny hero can take back what is rightfully his.
translation.ko: 이 작은 영웅은 마땅히 자기의 것을 되찾는다

translation.en: It has taken all his courage
for this young kangaroo rat to finally face his past.
Like all the animals that live in this harsh desert,
translation.ko: 이 거친 사막에 사는 모든 동물은

translation.en: they must face the impossible to survive.
translation.ko: 살아남기 위해 불가능한 것에 직면해야 한다

translation.en: This shows the true resilience of nature and its ability to overcome the odds.
translation.ko: 이것은 자연의 진정한 회복력과 역경을 극복하는 능력을 보여준다

translation.en: Often where there is fear, there is also opportunity...
as this kangaroo rat has discovered.
And now he has begun a new journey:
surviving, and more importantly, living freely in the great Wild West.
translation.ko: 생존하면서, 그리고 무엇보다도 서부에서 자유롭게 살면서
